page.description: Functions for working with the Alpha TransForm API.

discussion.p: There are several Xbasic functions that make working the TransForm API easier. In order to test any of the methods, you will first need to get an API key. To get an API key log into your account at *[extlink:https://transform.alphasoftware.com]* and from the *[ui:Home]* tab, select the *[ui:Developer Options]*, *[ui:Get TransForm API key]* options.
To get a list of all avilable Scopes, use the GetAPIScopeCodes API method in the TransForm API Explorer.
